title: [White Haven, Pool]
description: The warm steam that rises from the warm swirling water makes it difficult to see details.  The shapes of the lush plants surrounding the pool fade from view from time to time as yet another cloud of mist forms and floats past.  The water of the pool is warm and comforting as it washes away the aches and pains of the last journey.

A mosaic of lapis and jade fragments tiles the floor in a spiral that elegantly frames the large hot spring, the gemstone design echoed along a burnt cedar bar that juts out from the water's edge.  Finer details of the lush, tropical plants surrounding the bubbling pool fade from view as steam mists into clouds and rises from the swirling, warm water.
